sourcesContent:
<script>
import { Line, mixins } from 'vue-chartjs'

export default {
  extends: Line,
  mixins: [mixins.reactiveProp],
  props: {
    // options: {
    //   type: Object,
    //   default: null,
    // },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      options: {
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        scales: {
          xAxes: [{
            type: 'time',
            time: {
              unit: 'day',
            },
            ticks: {
              autoskipping: true,
              display: true,
              maxTicksLimit: 15,
            //   callback(a, b) {
            //     console.log(a, b)
            //   },
            },
          }],
          yAxes: [{
            ticks: {
              autoskipping: true,
              display: true,
              maxTicksLimit: 8,
            //   callback(a, b) {
            //     console.log(a, b)
            //   },
            },
          }],
        },
        plugins: {
          legend: {
            display: false,
            labels: {
              color: 'rgb(255, 99, 132)',
            },
          },
        },
      },
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.renderChart(this.chartData, this.options)
  },
}
</script>
